Definition: In this task, you're given a text and a title. The title might be slightly different from what is present in the text, but if it still refers to the same entity, then it is a correct title. Indicate your answer as "Yes" if the title is correct, otherwise indicate your answer as "No". Do not generate anything else apart from "Yes" or "No".

Positive Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Positive Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, it is the title of the document.

Positive Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Positive Examples.explanation: "HMS Argyll" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Here, the text in parentheses "F31" is not present in the document and it can be ignored. Hence, the output is correct.

Negative Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Negative Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, the output is incorrect.

Negative Examples.explanation: The output should be either "Yes" or "No". Hence, it is negative example.

Instances.input:
Text:  What's Done in the Dark is a play written and directed by American playwright Tyler Perry. The show first opened in September 2006. The play is a mixture of comedy drama and music set in a hospital emergency room and focuses on two nurses one of whom is a single mother and the other of whom is having an affair with a doctor and an eccentric hypochondriac patient who is in fact Mr. Brown. The DVD was released on February 12 2008. 
Title: Cally's Comet

Text:  Actinidia rubus is a woody climbing vine native to mountainous areas of the Chinese provinces of Sichuan and Yunnan. Branchlets and petioles are deep reddish-brown. Flowers are yellow. 
Title: Actinidia rubus

Text:  The Lynn Armory is a historic armory building at 36 S. Common Street in Lynn Massachusetts. It is one of the best examples of Romanesque Revival architecture in the city. It was built in 1893 out of red sandstone to a design by Wheeler & Northend. It features a head house measuring 68 feet (21 m) wide and 86 feet (26 m) deep behind which is a drill shed that is 127 feet (39 m) long. 
Title: Lynn Armory

Text:  Raycom Media Inc. is a broadcasting company based in Montgomery Alabama. 
Title: Col de la Croix Fry

Text:  Amrui (Persian: عمرويي‎ also Romanized as ‘Amrū’ī; also known as Amruni and Imrūni) is a village in Ayask Rural District in the Central District of Sarayan County South Khorasan Province Iran. At the 2006 census its population was 329 in 74 families. 
Title: Neil Harbisson

Text:  Craig Fuller (born July 18 1949) in is an American musician and songwriter. Co-founder of Pure Prairie League along with John David Call and George Ed Powell. Fuller departed in 1973 after their second album Bustin' Out due to draft board problems. He returned to the music business in 1976 for two LPs with American Flyer. After American Flyer dissolved Fuller returned to record one LP with former Flyer member Eric Kaz. 
Title: Craig Fuller

Text:  Not to be confused with Sheren Tang.Shermon Tang Sheung Man (Chinese: 鄧上文) is a Hong Kong television actress. Shermon was awarded the Miss Photogenic award at the 2005 Miss Hong Kong pageant launching her career in showbiz. Shermon attended King George V School an International School before studying in Australia.Actually Shermon's childhood ambition was to become a lawyer or a nurse. 
Title: Elte (river)

Text:  Monkey Trouble is a 1994 comedy film directed by Franco Amurri and starring Thora Birch. 
Title: Monkey Trouble
